quote: You have to be intentional just like success and anybody starts a business. You've got to be intentional on what it is that you want to do.
why_clipworthy: It emphasizes the importance of intentionality in business success.
suggested_hook: Are you intentional about your business growth?

quote: Always be connecting. Always keep in contact with people and then the sales will just follow you.
why_clipworthy: This is a simple yet powerful reminder of the importance of relationships in sales.
suggested_hook: The secret to sales success? It's simpler than you think.
